threshold_argmax[source]

threshold_argmax(y_score_1c, thresh:float=0.5)

Converts a sequence of floats into a list of zeros and ones.

Float values in the sequence are converted to 0 if they are smaller or equal to a set treshold or 1 if they are larger than the treshold.

Parameters

y_score_1c : 1d array-like of floats Target scores, can either be probability estimates of the positive class, confidence values, or non-thresholded measure of decisions (as returned by “decision_function” on some classifiers). For binary y_true, y_score is supposed to be the score of the class with greater label.

tresh : float, default=0.5 Treshold used for converting numbers in sequence

Returns

y_pred : 1d array-like of integers Converted scores to integers between 0 and 1

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
threshold_argmax([-0.1, 0., 0.49, 0.5, 0.51, 1., 1.1 ])

array([0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1])
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

youdens_jstats[source]

youdens_jstats(sens:float, spec:float)

Calculates Youden's J-statistic

Parameters

sens : float Sensitivity

spec : float Specificity

Returns

youden : float Youden's J-statistic

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

performance[source]

performance(y_true, y_score_1c, thresh=0.5, labels:list=[0, 1], bal_acc:bool=False, youden:bool=False, auroc:bool=False, err_rate:bool=False, bal_err_rate:bool=False)

Compute various performance metrics for binary classification predictions

Computes sensitivity, specificity and accuracy (optional: balanced accuracy, youden's j-statistic, roc auc) given a sequence of target scores (i.e. probabilities) and the respective ground truth for a binary classification. All metrics are evaluated at a given treshold.

Parameters

y_true : 1d array-like Ground truth (correct) target values

y_score_1c : 1d array-like of floats Target scores, can either be probability estimates of the positive class, confidence values, or non-thresholded measure of decisions (as returned by “decision_function” on some classifiers). For binary y_true, y_score is supposed to be the score of the class with greater label.

tresh : float Treshold

bal_acc : bool, default=False Whether to compute or not compute balanced accuracy

youden : bool, default=False Whether to compute or not compute Youden's J-statistic

auroc : bool, default=False Whether to compute or not compute area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (ROC AUC)

Returns

perf_metrics : dict Contains all calculated metrics

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
y_true = [0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0]
y_score_1c = [ 0., 0.3, 0.49, 0.5, 0.51, 0.8, 1.]
{% endraw %}
